name: Void Blitzing
description:
• Void Blitzing is not an early access game, but it is still in development and will receive regular updates and improvements. I am working hard to add more content, features, and polish to the game based on your feedback and suggestions. Thank you for your support and patience!

Your homeworld is under siege!, upgrade your ship, modify your weapons and fight your way through sectors now controlled by the enemy for a last chance to survive and counterattack.

2 different movement systems

  • Choose between arcade and simulator modes to customize your gameplay
    experience and challenge yourself.

Choose your ship

  • There are 6 ship variants with different stats and abilities to choose from

Strike

  • Fight over 18 unique enemies, 3 Main Bosses and 2 end game bosses

Upgrade

  • Upgrade your weapons and modify their stats to fight your own way

Rescue

  • Allied ships across different sectors are also under attack, help them
    to increase your chances of winning

Maneuver

  • Some enemies won't be easy to destroy, use your piloting skills to
    outmaneuver them

Other features:
  • Ship upgrades
  • Randomized levels
  • Dynamic music
  • Random events
  • Interactive environment
